## encode() function

Convenience alias for [StringEncoding.encode()](./iconv-corefoundation.stringencoding.encode.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function encode(text: string, encoding: string | StringEncoding, options?: EncodeOptions): Buffer;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  text | <code>string</code> | The text to encode. |
|  encoding | <code>string &#124; StringEncoding</code> | The encoding to use. May be an IANA character set name or a [StringEncoding](./iconv-corefoundation.stringencoding.md)<!-- -->. |
|  options | <code>EncodeOptions</code> | Options for encoding. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Buffer`

The encoded text, in a `Buffer`<!-- -->.

## Remarks

Throws [NotRepresentableError](./iconv-corefoundation.notrepresentableerror.md) if the `text` cannot be fully represented in this encoding, and `options` does not contain a `lossByte`<!-- -->.
